pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 14, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Singapore

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with Singapore business leaders.

Windows West Room, 20th Floor
Four Seasons Hotel Singapore
190 Orchard Boulevard

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Canada-China Annual Leaders Dialogue.

Embassy and Consulate Room
The St. Regis Singapore
29 Tanglin Road

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an ASEAN working lunch hosted by Prime Minister of the Republic of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.

Note for media:

    • Official photographers only

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Canada Spotlight event at the Singapore FinTech Festival, and will deliver remarks.

Topaz Room, Second Floor
Singapore Expo Convention and Exhibition Centre
1 Expo Drive

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chairman and Managing Director of Agrocorp Vijay Iyengar.

Room 219, Second Floor
Singapore Expo Convention and Exhibition Centre
1 Expo Drive

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a signing ceremony with Prime Minister of the Republic of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.

Singapore Expo Convention and Exhibition Centre
1 Expo Drive

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of the Republic of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.

Singapore Expo Convention and Exhibition Centre
1 Expo Drive

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

6:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the ASEAN Summit Gala Reception hosted by Prime Minister of the Republic of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.

Note for media:

    • Official photographers only
